SWEAT-FREE SHOPPING: FREE SHIPPING on orders $75+ & FREE RETURNS on any purchase

Free standard shipping offer valid on purchases of $75 or more in the same order. Orders can be shipped anywhere in the 50 United States, including Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands. A $10.00 surcharge will be applied to all orders shipped to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands and may take extra delivery time. To return an item free of charge, please pack it in its original condition and send it back to us within 45 days of purchase using the prepaid return label.
